item.title: Configuring Wi-Fi on Ubuntu Server 64-bit on Raspberry Pi 4
item.description: After discovering that by default Raspberry installs 32-bit Raspbian OS, I wanted to reinstall it with a 64 bit - this would allow to run Kubernetes on Raspberry Decided to go with Ubuntu Server 64.
